action_title: Create artificial hibernacula or aestivation sites
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One replicated, before-and-after study in the UKÂ found that providing artificial hibernacula, along with other terrestrial habitat management, maintained populations of great crested newts.
One replicated study in the UK found that created hibernacula were used by common frog and smooth newts, but not great crested newts. One replicated study in the UK found four amphibian species close to hibernacula at two of three sites.
